pr_title: Use quarkus.http.root-path when creating kubernetes health related build items

timeline.author: Ladicek
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -88,6 +89,8 @@ void healthCheck(BuildProducer<AdditionalBeanBuildItem> buildItemBuildProducer,
     void build(SmallRyeHealthRecorder recorder, RecorderContext recorderContext,
             BuildProducer<FeatureBuildItem> feature,
             BuildProducer<RouteBuildItem> routes,
+
+            HttpBuildTimeConfig httpConfig,

replies.bodyText: Right! Let me get rid of it.
replies.author: iocanel

timeline.message:
fix (#6833): quarkus.http.root-path is taken into consideration when
defining kubernetes health probes.

fix: add missing pom.xml to kubernetes-with-smallrye-health
integration test.
